Class SoundboardViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • otp.group6.view.SoundboardViewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class SoundboardViewController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller class for the Soundboard view
    Author:
    Kevin Akkoyun

      • loadSavedSamples

        public void loadSavedSamples()
        Loads samples with SoundboardController from sampledata.txt
        Creates buttons equal to the amount of Samples loaded.
        WARNING size of Soundboard.sampleArray cannot exceed 20

      • openFileExplorer

        private java.io.File openFileExplorer()
        Opens system file explorer and returns selected file if it is .wav
        Performs a regex check to see if file is .wav
        Returns:
        .wav file or null

      • addNewSoundButton

        private void addNewSoundButton(javafx.scene.layout.Pane container)
        Adds a newSoundButton loaded from an FXML template to given Pane.
        Clears all children from given Pane
        Parameters:
        container - for the button clearContainer(Pane)

      • addSoundboardButton

        private javafx.scene.layout.Pane addSoundboardButton(javafx.scene.layout.Pane container,
                                                     int sampleIndex,
                                                     SoundboardViewController.OP_TYPE type)
        Adds a new Soundboard button loaded from an FXML template to given container.
        Clears all children from given container By default sets create buttons index in buttonList to its length.
        Parameters:
        container - - parent element for the button
        sampleIndex - - index of the sample related to the button
        type - - either NEW or EXISTING. Defines if button should be loaded as new from fxml or loaded from existing list of buttons.
        Returns:
        if successful, returns created buttons root, otherwise returns null

      • clearContainer

        private void clearContainer(javafx.scene.layout.Pane container)
        Removes children from the given container.
        Parameters:
        container - - container to be cleared
        See Also:
        Pane

                        javafx.scene.control.Button button)

        Parameters:
        index - - index of the Sample

        Functionality for the edit button

      • renameButton

        private void renameButton(int index)
        Creates a new TextField and brings it to the front.
        The created TextField will take its input upon KeyCode.ENTER or focus loss. Checks if the input is valid and changes sample name.
        Parameters:
        index - - index of the Sample

      • deleteButton

        private void deleteButton(int index)
        Removes specified sample with given index
        Deletes last button on the screen then refreshes all button names
        Parameters:
        index - - index of the sample

      • clearAllButton

        private void clearAllButton()
        Clears everything and recreates storage variables

      • alertCheck

        private boolean alertCheck(java.lang.String msg)
        Creates an alert to confirm if the user wants to complete certain action
        Parameters:
        msg - - warning message to be displayed.
        Returns:
        returns the selected choice, either true or false

      • switchIconVisibility

        private void switchIconVisibility(javafx.scene.control.Button button,
                                  boolean bool)
        Method that switches the visibility of button icons if true is given, sets the visibility of "play" icon to true and "stop" to false
        if false is given, the operation is reverse
        Parameters:
        button - - Soundboard play - button
        bool - - Wether or not to display the play icon
